user_question: What are the top three stocks to watch this week and generate a chart comparing their performance over the past month?
final_answer: The top three stocks to watch this week are Tesla (TSLA), Apple (AAPL), and Amazon (AMZN). A chart comparing their performance over the past month has been generated. TSLA shows a steady upward trend, AAPL has moderate growth, and AMZN shows volatility with a recent upward spike.
